About.

  • Writers

Jared Young

Jared’s reviews have appeared in the Toronto Star, Bangkok Post, and other places. His other writing can be found in places like Maisonneuve, Descant, The Fiddlehead, The Ottawa Citizen, and has been anthologized by McSweeney’s. He likes movies. But he failed out of film school. So, you know, take it all with a grain of salt.
